definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Catechin is a phenol antioxidant found in grape seeds.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄籽中含有的儿茶素是一种酚类抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: Study on the specific adsorption of catechin gallates by cedar lignocellulose.
sentences.chinese: 杉树木质纤维素对酯型儿茶素类选择性吸附的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-influenza effect of catechu extract.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究儿茶儿茶素的抗流感病毒作用。

sentences.english: Affecting factors of extracting tea polyphenols and catechin assisted by ultrasonic wave were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 对超声辅助法提取茶多酚和儿茶素的条件进行了研究。

sentences.english: It may be because you are lacking catechins in your brain.
sentences.chinese: 这也许正是因为您的大脑里少了儿茶素。

sentences.english: Effect of Dietary Tea Catechins on Fatty Acid Composition of Phosphatidylcholine in Rats.
sentences.chinese: 儿茶素对大白鼠磷脂酰胆碱脂肪酸组成影响的研究。

sentences.english: Catechins are great for keeping your mind sharp, fresh, and functioning properly.
sentences.chinese: 儿茶素有助于保持思维的敏锐快捷和正常运作。

sentences.english: The catechin is one kind of polyphenol. It is made up of four isomers.
sentences.chinese: 儿茶素属于多酚类的一种，其中以茶叶的含量最多。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4

definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
